name: My Game Cabinet
description:
This is My Game Cabinet, a collection of classic board and card games for anyone to play. This project will continue to grow as I add more games and more versions.

As of right now, the collection contains two games those being Blackjack and The Royal Game of Ur but I have dozens of games I’d like to add such as solitaire, checkers, and poker. All games both past and future will be playable in single-player and when available I will add local multiplayer.

Thank you for taking a look and I hope you enjoy
